Title: MeSH therapeutic use based on chemical structure
Description: Drug function, defined as Medical Subject Headings (MeSH) “therapeutic use” is predicted based on the chemical structure. 6955 non-redundant molecules, pertaining to one of the twelve therapeutic use classes selected, were downloaded from PubChem and used to train a binary classifier. The model provides the probability that a molecule has one of the following therapeutic uses: antineoplastic, cardiovascular, central nervous system (CNS), anti-infective, gastrointestinal, anti-inflammatory, dermatological, hematologic, lipid regulating, reproductive control, respiratory system, urological.
Interpretation: Probability that the molecule belongs to each therapeutic use specified.
